todotxt
  • Reference

    todotxt

    Todo.txt is a standard for text-based todo lists. The goal of this package is to parse todo.txt files like this one into tibbles.

    Most of the work of parsing todo.txt files in todotxt is done by the Python todotxtio package.

    We also expose other functionality from the todotxtio Python package for updating todo lists to support users in building todo.txt based applications.

    Installation

    You can install todotxt from github with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MHenderson/todotxt")
    library(httr)
library(magrittr)
library(todotxt)

GET("http://todotxt.org/todo.txt") %>%
  content("text") %>%
  todotxt()
#> # A tibble: 8 x 8
#>   creation_date priority completion_date text   completed context projects
#>   <lgl>         <chr>    <lgl>           <chr>  <lgl>     <list>  <list>  
#> 1 NA            A        NA              Call … FALSE     <chr [… <chr [1…
#> 2 NA            A        NA              Sched… FALSE     <lgl [… <chr [1…
#> 3 NA            B        NA              Outli… FALSE     <chr [… <chr [1…
#> 4 NA            C        NA              Add c… FALSE     <chr [… <chr [1…
#> 5 NA            <NA>     NA              Plan … FALSE     <chr [… <lgl [1…
#> 6 NA            <NA>     NA              Pick … FALSE     <chr [… <lgl [1…
#> 7 NA            <NA>     NA              Resea… FALSE     <chr [… <chr [1…
#> 8 NA            <NA>     NA              Downl… TRUE      <chr [… <lgl [1…
#> # ... with 1 more variable: tags <list>
